summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Janier Nail Tips and Glue Gel Kit,2 In 1 Nail Glue Base Coat&Top Coat with Long Coffin False Clear Half Cover Fake Nail and UV LED Nail Lamp for Nail Extension DIY Nail Art…
Review Date: 2021/12/18
Store: Janier
Product Description: ['1']
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Janier', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Item Package Quantity': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '5.12 x 3.82 x 3.19 inches; 9.63 Ounces', 'UPC': '750081718188'}
Review Text: This is a great set. It comes with everything you need minus the gel polish. I especially appreciate the gel glue I prefer that over the other regular nail glue. The lamp however is another story u can only cure 1-2 nails at a time depending on you hand size doesn’t get me wrong it works just fine it’s just that nobody has time to do One nail at a time. I already have a regular side led lamp at home so it wasn’t a deal breaker for this is why I still gave them 5⭐️‘S
Review Title: Amazing set minus the LED lamp
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Veda Tinda Gel Nail Polish Kit 20 Colors Fall Winter Modern Stage Soak off UV/LED Lamp Nail Polish Set with Glossy & Matte Top Coat and Base Coat Christmas
Review Date: 2021/12/23
Store: veda Tinda
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'veda Tinda', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'base', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy, Matte', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Unit Count': '3.50 Fl Oz', 'Liquid Volume': '0.25 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '10.63 x 3.98 x 3.94 inches; 1.81 Pounds'}
Review Text: [[VIDEOID:a85cb1993222ab6477f64f176b1d9758]] Such pretty colors, I love them all!
Review Title: Gorgeous colors
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Hair Tail Tools
Review Date: 2022/01/06
Store: Teenitor
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Material': 'Carbon Fiber', 'Brand': 'Teenitor', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Size': '4 Piece Set', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '8.7 x 4.33 x 0.47 inches; 0.63 Ounces'}
Review Text: I was just in the market for a hair band remover when I came across this pack I couldn’t pass on it first off the remover works great not more pulling my daughters hair we are both happy about that. The rat tail comb really good quality and the pony helper is new to me But I’ve been looking at YouTube videos and I’m excited to use them and facilitate my hubby’s ponytail skills when I’m not around. Incredible deal with what you get for under 6bucks.
Review Title: Great deal
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Gold Collagen Under Eye Patches Mask for dark circles and puffiness by Levitural - Golden Eye Bags Treatment - Mother's Day Gift for Women
Review Date: 2022/01/06
Store: LV Levitural
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'LV Levitural', 'Item Form': 'Mask', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing,Hydration', 'Scent': 'Rose', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Package Dimensions': '3.25 x 3.25 x 1.6 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'UPC': '766234785310'}
Review Text: These masks really really do a good job at hydrating and moisturizing my under eyes as well as getting rid of the puffy under eye bags.
Review Title: Highly moisturizing
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Large Silk Scrunchies For Hair - Tara Sartoria Artisan Handmade
Review Date: 2022/01/30
Store: Tara Sartoria
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Material': 'Silk', 'Item Form': 'Scrunchie', 'Brand': 'Tara Sartoria', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Number of Pieces': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '4.37 x 3.9 x 0.71 inches; 1.09 Ounces'}
Review Text: Extremely happy with my silk scrunchies. They are really soft, don’t pull my hair nor leave indentations on hair when taken off from a pulled back in ponytail. Well made and come with a little Travel baggie. I highly recommend this set and the brand as I had already own their silk sleeping mask which was another hit for me.
Review Title: Really soft
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: B.O.B BARS OVER BOTTLES Solid Conditioner Bar for Balanced Moisture| Oily Hair | Hair Care, Ideal Ph Balance | Natural, Vegan | Eco-friendly, Sustainable, Plastic Free | Waterless & Zero Waste
Review Date: 2022/03/09
Store: B.O.B BARS OVER BOTTLES
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'B.O.B BARS OVER BOTTLES', 'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Material Feature': 'Natural, Plant Based, Vegan, Waterless, Plastic-Free', 'Hair Type': 'Oily, Normal', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '2.91 x 2.76 x 1.14 inches; 1.9 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'B.O.B BARS OVER BOTTLES', 'Country of Origin': 'Brazil'}
Review Text: I only wish it was bigger! I love it it’s truly is very hydrating. Does wonder for my color treated curly hair!
Review Title: Amazing conditioner
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: B.O.B BARS OVER BOTTLES Moisturizing Shampoo Bar | For Curly Hair | Hair Care, Ideal Ph Balance |Natural, Vegan | Eco-friendly, Sustainable, Plastic Free | Waterless & Zero Waste
Review Date: 2022/03/09
Store: B.O.B BARS OVER BOTTLES
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'B.O.B BARS OVER BOTTLES', 'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy, Curly, Dry', 'Scent': 'Citric and Woody', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.56 x 2.56 x 1.46 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'B.O.B BARS OVER BOTTLES', 'Country of Origin': 'Brazil'}
Review Text: I never thought I’d like bar shampoo this much. I was pleasantly surprised! This shampoo accompanied with their conditioner is a match made in heaven! My hair has never felt more healthy and alive. I just wished the bars were  bigger.
Review Title: Wow!
Rating: 5.0

prompt:
Based on the provided purchase history, generate three separate summaries focusing on different aspects of the user's experiences. Each summary should be under 256 words. Focus only on keywords and clear trends supported by multiple interactions. Do not repeat specific product names or details. avoid repeating product names, specifications, or technical details:

        1. POSITIVE: Describe only the positive experiences and what was liked.

        2. NEGATIVE: Describe only the negative experiences and what was disliked.

        3. OVERALL: Provide a overall summary including both positive and negative aspects.

raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:
The user has experienced numerous positive interactions with various beauty products. They particularly appreciated the comprehensive nature of nail kits, highlighting the effectiveness of gel glue over regular options. The nail colors in the polish kit were described as stunning and elicited strong enjoyment. Hair care tools received praise for their quality, notably a hair band remover that improved hair handling, leading to greater satisfaction for both user and child. The user found under-eye masks very hydrating, successfully addressing puffiness. Silk scrunchies received high marks for being soft yet effective, and the travel convenience was noted. Additionally, solid shampoo and conditioner bars were commended for their hydrating properties, with strong positive feelings about the overall results on hair health.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
While the user generally had a favorable shopping experience, some negative aspects were noted. Specific complaints include the limited capacity of a LED lamp, which required curing nails individually, leading to time-consuming processes. Despite this, it was not a dealbreaker for them. There was a desire for larger sizes in shampoo and conditioner bars, highlighting a perceived insufficiency in product longevity. A wig was received with mixed feelings, as although it met costume needs, it fell short of higher expectations, reflected by its average rating.

OVERALL SUMMARY:
The user’s shopping history showcases a mix of favorable and unfavorable interactions with beauty products. They consistently praised the quality, effectiveness, and aesthetic appeal of various beauty kits and tools, demonstrating strong satisfaction in areas such as nail care, hair accessories, and skin treatments. However, some aspects like the size limitations of certain products and minor functionality issues deterred their overall experience. These negatives did not overshadow the positive sentiments, indicating a generally fulfilling engagement with beauty shopping despite a few drawbacks.
